Html:
Hi,

 What happen to the release of the DateTime control ? You had it in future plans for a wile now, and it seems it's not there anymore. I am really waiting for this control.

Regards,
Calin
Sorry for the double post, bad internet connection :(

Hi Calin,

DatePicker/Calendar control is in the works and will be available later this fall along with the finished DataGrid control.

Thanks!
Samantha

Hi Samantha,

 Thank you very much for you response.
 Do you have a more accurate date, at least a month ?

 Or a document with remaining issues, I will be more than glad to work along and help.

Thanks,
Calin

Hi Calin,

I'm sorry, but I really can't be more specific than that.  We're still in the middle of our development cycle and we don't have an exact finish date yet.  Please check back in a few weeks.

Thanks!
Samantha

Hi Samantha,

I am waiting for this too - but it's much more important to get it right!  Good luck to your team.

Jon

Hi Samantha,

Do you know if the control is going to have multi-month support (support for displaying two months at the same time)? We are looking for a DatePicker control that has support for that.

Regards,
Alexander

Hi Alexander,

The DatePicker won't have multi-month support out of the box, but it will be extensible.

Thanks,
Samantha
